mapper.select: SELECT f.flight_number, COALESCE(SUM(p.payment_total), 0) AS total_payment, a.airline_name FROM flight f LEFT JOIN payment p ON f.flight_id = p.flight_id JOIN airline a ON f.user_id = a.user_id WHERE f.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY f.flight_number, a.airline_name ORDER BY total_payment asc

SELECT f.flight_number, SUM(p.payment_total) AS total_payment, a.airline_name, f.DEPARTURE_TIME, CASE WHEN EXTRACT(month FROM f.DEPARTURE_TIME) = 10 THEN '10월' WHEN EXTRACT(month FROM f.DEPARTURE_TIME) = 11 THEN '11월' WHEN EXTRACT(month FROM f.DEPARTURE_TIME) = 12 THEN '12월' WHEN EXTRACT(month FROM f.DEPARTURE_TIME) = 1 THEN '1월' ELSE '기타' -- 다른 월을 처리하는 경우 END AS month FROM flight f JOIN payment p ON f.flight_id = p.flight_id JOIN airline a ON f.user_id = a.user_id GROUP BY f.flight_number, a.airline_name, f.DEPARTURE_TIME, CASE WHEN EXTRACT(month FROM f.DEPARTURE_TIME) = 10 THEN '10월' WHEN EXTRACT(month FROM f.DEPARTURE_TIME) = 11 THEN '11월' WHEN EXTRACT(month FROM f.DEPARTURE_TIME) = 12 THEN '12월' WHEN EXTRACT(month FROM f.DEPARTURE_TIME) = 1 THEN '1월' ELSE '기타' END ORDER BY month, f.flight_number
